name: d3-spatialsankey
description: Geodesign's Leaflet-based Sankey diagram for geospatial data

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-scale:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-spatialsankey.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-spatialsankey.js -c -m -o build/d3-spatialsankey.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-spatialsankey.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-spatialsankey.js build/d3-spatialsankey.min.js

author: geodesign (npm: flaxandteal)
